settings.desc: This Privacy Policy describes how Aran Braxton ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, discloses, and protects the personal information of individuals who visit our website, interact with our brand, or use our services. Protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information is of utmost importance to us. By accessing or using our website or services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

We may collect personal information from you when you voluntarily provide it to us. This may include your name, email address, postal address, phone number, payment details, and any other information you choose to provide.

We may collect non-personal information automatically when you visit our website or interact with our brand. This may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, device information, and browsing patterns.

settings.title3: We may use your personal information to:
settings.desc:
• Process and fulfill your orders
  • Communicate with you regarding your orders, inquiries, or requests
  • Provide customer support and respond to your comments or questions
  • Send you promotional materials or marketing communications (if you have opted-in)
  • Customize and improve your experience on our website
  • Prevent fraudulent activities or unauthorized transactionsComply with legal obligations

We may use non-personal information for analytical purposes, such as analyzing trends, tracking user movements, and gathering demographic information. This helps us improve our website, services, and marketing strategies.

We may engage trusted third-party service providers to assist us in operating our business and providing our services. These service providers may have access to your personal information but are obligated to use it only to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf.
We may disclose your personal information if required to do so by law or in response to a valid legal request, such as a court order or government investigation.

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no data transmission over the internet or electronic storage method is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
If you no longer wish to receive marketing communications from us, you can opt-out by emailing us at customersupport@aranbraxton.com.
If you believe that any personal information we hold about you is inaccurate or incomplete, you may contact us to update or correct it.

Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites before providing any personal information.

Our website and services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child, please contact us, and we will take appropriate steps to delete the information.

settings.title1: SECTION 8 - Changes to this Privacy Policy
settings.desc: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised version on our website. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at customersupport@aranbraxton.com.

By using our website or services, you signify your consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
